body.text: We've noticed a significant drop in sales for the month of August. This could be due to the holiday season or other external factors.

highlightedInfo.holiday season: August is a common holiday month which can affect sales.

body.text: We've observed a surge in website traffic in the last week. This might be related to the recent marketing campaign.

highlightedInfo.recent marketing campaign: The marketing campaign started in the first week of August and targeted social media platforms.
